<content>
from flask import Blueprint, request, jsonify
from werkzeug.security import generate_password_hash
from functools import wraps
from .models import db, User, Employee, Task, Project
import jwt
import os

api = Blueprint('api', __name__)

def token_required(f):
    @wraps(f)
    def decorated(*args, **kwargs):
        token = request.headers.get('Authorization')
        if not token:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is missing'}), 401

        try:
            token = token.split(' ')[1]  # Remove 'Bearer ' prefix
            payload = User.verify_token(token)
            if not payload:
                return jsonify({'message': 'Invalid token'}), 401
            
            current_user = User.query.get(payload['user_id'])
            if not current_user:
                return jsonify({'message': 'User not found'}), 401
            
        except Exception as e:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is invalid'}), 401

        return f(current_user, *args, **kwargs)
    return decorated

@api.route('/register', methods=['POST'])
def register():
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if not all(k in data for k in ('username', 'email', 'password')):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Missing required fields'}), 400

    if User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first():
        return jsonify({'message': 'Username already exists'}), 400

    if User.query.filter_by(email=data['email']).first():
        return jsonify({'message': 'Email already exists'}), 400

    user = User(
        username=data['username'],
        email=data['email'],
        role=data.get('role', 'employee')
    )
    user.set_password(data['password'])
    
    db.session.add(user)
    db.session.commit()

    # Create employee profile if role is employee
    if user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee(
            user_id=user.id,
            name=data.get('name', data['username']),
            position=data.get('position', ''),
            department=data.get('department', '')
        )
        db.session.add(employee)
        db.session.commit()

    return jsonify({
        'message': 'User created successfully',
        'user_id': user.id
    }), 201

@api.route('/login', methods=['POST'])
def login():
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if not all(k in data for k in ('username', 'password')):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Missing username or password'}), 400

    user = User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first()
    
    if not user or not user.check_password(data['password']):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Invalid username or password'}), 401

    token = user.generate_token()
    
    return jsonify({
        'token': token,
        'user': {
            'id': user.id,
            'username': user.username,
            'role': user.role
        }
    }), 200

@api.route('/user/profile', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_profile(current_user):
    if current_user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee.query.filter_by(user_id=current_user.id).first()
        return jsonify({
            'id': current_user.id,
            'username': current_user.username,
            'email': current_user.email,
            'role': current_user.role,
            'employee_details': {
                'name': employee.name,
                'position': employee.position,
                'department': employee.department,
                'hire_date': employee.hire_date.isoformat() if employee.hire_date else None
            }
        })
    
    return jsonify({
        'id': current_user.id,
        'username': current_user.username,
        'email': current_user.email,
        'role': current_user.role
    })

@api.route('/user/profile', methods=['PUT'])
@token_required
def update_profile(current_user):
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if 'email' in data and data['email'] != current_user.email:
        if User.query.filter_by(email=data['email']).first():
            return jsonify({'message': 'Email already exists'}), 400
        current_user.email = data['email']
    
    if 'password' in data:
        current_user.set_password(data['password'])
    
    if current_user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee.query.filter_by(user_id=current_user.id).first()
        if employee:
            if 'name' in data:
                employee.name = data['name']
            if 'position' in data:
                employee.position = data['position']
            if 'department' in data:
                employee.department = data['department']
    
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Profile updated successfully'})

# Protected routes example
@api.route('/protected/data', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def protected_data(current_user):
    return jsonify({
        'message': 'This is protected data',
        'user': current_user.username
    })

# Error handlers
@api.errorhandler(400)
def bad_request(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Bad request'}), 400

@api.errorhandler(401)
def unauthorized(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Unauthorized'}), 401

@api.errorhandler(403)
def forbidden(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Forbidden'}), 403

@api.errorhandler(404)
def not_found(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Not found'}), 404

@api.errorhandler(500)
def internal_server_error(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Internal server error'}), 500
</content>

from flask import Flask
from flask_cors import CORS
from flask_migrate import Migrate
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os
from .models import db
from .routes import api

# Load environment variables
load_dotenv()

def create_app():
    app = Flask(__name__)
    
    # Configure CORS
    CORS(app, resources={
        r"/api/*": {
            "origins": ["http://localhost:3000"],
            "methods": ["GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE"],
            "allow_headers": ["Content-Type", "Authorization"]
        }
    })

    # Database configuration
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = os.getenv('DATABASE_URL', 'sqlite:///jobmanagement.db')
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
    app.config['SECRET_KEY'] = os.getenv('SECRET_KEY', 'dev-secret-key')

    # Initialize extensions
    db.init_app(app)
    migrate = Migrate(app, db)

    # Register blueprints
    app.register_blueprint(api, url_prefix='/api')

    # Create database tables
    with app.app_context():
        db.create_all()

    @app.route('/health')
    def health_check():
        return {'status': 'healthy'}, 200

    return app

app = create_app()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run(debug=True, port=5000)
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
import React from 'react';
import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import './Navbar.css';

const Navbar = () => {
    const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = React.useState(false);
    const { isDarkMode, toggleTheme } = useTheme();
    const location = useLocation();
    const navigate = useNavigate();
    const token = localStorage.getItem('token');

    const isActive = (path) => {
        return location.pathname === path;
    };

    const handleLogout = () => {
        localStorage.removeItem('token');
        navigate('/login');
    };

    const toggleMobileMenu = () => {
        setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen);
    };

    return (
        <nav className={`navbar ${isDarkMode ? 'theme-dark' : ''}`}>
            <div className="navbar-container">
                <Link to="/" className="navbar-brand">
                    <span className="material-icons">work</span>
                    <span>JobManager</span>
                </Link>

                <button className="mobile-menu-button" onClick={toggleMobileMenu}>
                    <span className="material-icons">
                        {isMobileMenuOpen ? 'close' : 'menu'}
                    </span>
                </button>

                <div className={`navbar-menu ${isMobileMenuOpen ? 'is-open' : ''}`}>
                    <Link 
                        to="/" 
                        className={`nav-item ${isActive('/') ? 'active' : ''}`}
                        onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
                    >
                        <span className="material-icons">home</span>
                        <span>Home</span>
                    </Link>

                    {token && (
                        <>
                            <Link 
                                to="/dashboard" 
                                className={`nav-item ${isActive('/dashboard') ? 'active' : ''}`}
                                onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
                            >
                                <span className="material-icons">dashboard</span>
                                <span>Dashboard</span>
                            </Link>

                            <Link 
                                to="/tasks" 
                                className={`nav-item ${isActive('/tasks') ? 'active' : ''}`}
                                onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
                            >
                                <span className="material-icons">task</span>
                                <span>Tasks</span>
                            </Link>

                            <Link 
                                to="/projects" 
                                className={`nav-item ${isActive('/projects') ? 'active' : ''}`}
                                onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
                            >
                                <span className="material-icons">folder</span>
                                <span>Projects</span>
                            </Link>

                            <Link 
                                to="/employees" 
                                className={`nav-item ${isActive('/employees') ? 'active' : ''}`}
                                onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
                            >
                                <span className="material-icons">groups</span>
                                <span>Employees</span>
                            </Link>
                        </>
                    )}
                </div>

                <div className="navbar-end">
                    <button 
                        className="theme-toggle-btn"
                        onClick={toggleTheme}
                        title={`Switch to ${isDarkMode ? 'light' : 'dark'} mode`}
                    >
                        <span className="material-icons">
                            {isDarkMode ? 'light_mode' : 'dark_mode'}
                        </span>
                    </button>

                    {token ? (
                        <>
                            <div className="navbar-item">
                                <span className="material-icons">notifications</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="navbar-item" onClick={handleLogout}>
                                <span className="material-icons">logout</span>
                            </div>
                        </>
                    ) : (
                        <Link to="/login" className="login-btn">
                            <span className="material-icons">login</span>
                            <span>Login</span>
                        </Link>
                    )}
                </div>
            </div>
        </nav>
    );
};

export default Navbar;
</content>
</create_file>

<create_file>
<path>JobManagementSystem/frontend/src/components/Navbar.css</path>
<content>
.navbar {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 64px;
    background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
    box-shadow: 0 2px 4px var(--shadow-color);
    z-index: 1000;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.navbar-container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    height: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 0 1rem;
}

.navbar-brand {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: var(--text-primary);
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.navbar-brand .material-icons {
    color: var(--google-blue);
    font-size: 24px;
}

.navbar-menu {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.nav-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
    border-radius: 8px;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.nav-item .material-icons {
    font-size: 20px;
}

.nav-item:hover {
    background-color: var(--hover-bg);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.nav-item.active {
    background-color: var(--active-bg);
    color: var(--google-blue);
}

.navbar-end {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.navbar-item {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border-radius: 50%;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: background-color 0.2s ease;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.navbar-item:hover {
    background-color: var(--hover-bg);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.theme-toggle-btn {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
    border-radius: 50%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.theme-toggle-btn:hover {
    background-color: var(--hover-bg);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.theme-toggle-btn .material-icons {
    font-size: 24px;
}

.login-btn {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    background-color: var(--google-blue);
    color: white;
    border-radius: 8px;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 500;
    transition: background-color 0.2s ease;
}

.login-btn:hover {
    background-color: var(--google-blue-hover);
}

.mobile-menu-button {
    display: none;
    background: none;
    border: none;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.mobile-menu-button .material-icons {
    font-size: 24px;
}

/* Dark Theme Specific Styles */
.navbar.theme-dark {
    background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .mobile-menu-button {
        display: block;
    }

    .navbar-menu {
        position: fixed;
        top: 64px;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
        flex-direction: column;
        padding: 1rem;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 4px var(--shadow-color);
        transform: translateY(-100%);
        opacity: 0;
        pointer-events: none;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    .navbar-menu.is-open {
        transform: translateY(0);
        opacity: 1;
        pointer-events: auto;
    }

    .nav-item {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
    }

    .navbar-end {
        gap: 0.5rem;
    }

    .navbar-item {
        width: 36px;
        height: 36px;
    }

    .login-btn span:last-child {
        display: none;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
    .navbar-brand span:last-child {
        display: none;
    }

    .navbar-container {
        padding: 0 0.75rem;
    }

    .navbar-end {
        gap: 0.25rem;
    }

    .navbar-item {
        width: 32px;
        height: 32px;
    }

    .navbar-item .material-icons {
        font-size: 20px;
    }
}
</content>
</create_file>

api = Blueprint('api', __name__)

def token_required(f):
    @wraps(f)
    def decorated(*args, **kwargs):
        token = request.headers.get('Authorization')
        if not token:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is missing'}), 401

        try:
            token = token.split(' ')[1]  # Remove 'Bearer ' prefix
            payload = User.verify_token(token)
            if not payload:
                return jsonify({'message': 'Invalid token'}), 401
            
            current_user = User.query.get(payload['user_id'])
            if not current_user:
                return jsonify({'message': 'User not found'}), 401
            
        except Exception as e:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is invalid'}), 401

        return f(current_user, *args, **kwargs)
    return decorated

@api.route('/register', methods=['POST'])
def register():
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if not all(k in data for k in ('username', 'email', 'password')):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Missing required fields'}), 400

    if User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first():
        return jsonify({'message': 'Username already exists'}), 400

    if User.query.filter_by(email=data['email']).first():
        return jsonify({'message': 'Email already exists'}), 400

    user = User(
        username=data['username'],
        email=data['email'],
        role=data.get('role', 'employee')
    )
    user.set_password(data['password'])
    
    db.session.add(user)
    db.session.commit()

    # Create employee profile if role is employee
    if user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee(
            user_id=user.id,
            name=data.get('name', data['username']),
            position=data.get('position', ''),
            department=data.get('department', '')
        )
        db.session.add(employee)
        db.session.commit()

    return jsonify({
        'message': 'User created successfully',
        'user_id': user.id
    }), 201

@api.route('/login', methods=['POST'])
def login():
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if not all(k in data for k in ('username', 'password')):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Missing username or password'}), 400

    user = User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first()
    
    if not user or not user.check_password(data['password']):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Invalid username or password'}), 401

    token = user.generate_token()
    
    return jsonify({
        'token': token,
        'user': {
            'id': user.id,
            'username': user.username,
            'role': user.role
        }
    }), 200

@api.route('/user/profile', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_profile(current_user):
    if current_user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee.query.filter_by(user_id=current_user.id).first()
        return jsonify({
            'id': current_user.id,
            'username': current_user.username,
            'email': current_user.email,
            'role': current_user.role,
            'employee_details': {
                'name': employee.name,
                'position': employee.position,
                'department': employee.department,
                'hire_date': employee.hire_date.isoformat() if employee.hire_date else None
            }
        })
    
    return jsonify({
        'id': current_user.id,
        'username': current_user.username,
        'email': current_user.email,
        'role': current_user.role
    })

@api.route('/user/profile', methods=['PUT'])
@token_required
def update_profile(current_user):
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if 'email' in data and data['email'] != current_user.email:
        if User.query.filter_by(email=data['email']).first():
            return jsonify({'message': 'Email already exists'}), 400
        current_user.email = data['email']
    
    if 'password' in data:
        current_user.set_password(data['password'])
    
    if current_user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee.query.filter_by(user_id=current_user.id).first()
        if employee:
            if 'name' in data:
                employee.name = data['name']
            if 'position' in data:
                employee.position = data['position']
            if 'department' in data:
                employee.department = data['department']
    
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Profile updated successfully'})

# Protected routes example
@api.route('/protected/data', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def protected_data(current_user):
    return jsonify({
        'message': 'This is protected data',
        'user': current_user.username
    })

# Error handlers
@api.errorhandler(400)
def bad_request(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Bad request'}), 400

@api.errorhandler(401)
def unauthorized(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Unauthorized'}), 401

@api.errorhandler(403)
def forbidden(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Forbidden'}), 403

@api.errorhandler(404)
def not_found(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Not found'}), 404

@api.errorhandler(500)
def internal_server_error(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Internal server error'}), 500

from flask import Flask
from flask_cors import CORS
from flask_migrate import Migrate
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import os
from models import db, User
from routes import api

# Load environment variables
load_dotenv()

def create_default_admin():
    admin = User.query.filter_by(username='admin').first()
    if not admin:
        admin = User(
            username='admin',
            email='admin@jobmanager.com',
            role='admin'
        )
        admin.set_password('admin123')
        db.session.add(admin)
        db.session.commit()
        print("Default admin user created:")
        print("Username: admin")
        print("Password: admin123")

def create_app():
    app = Flask(__name__)
    
    # Configure CORS
    CORS(app, resources={
        r"/api/*": {
            "origins": ["http://localhost:3000"],
            "methods": ["GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE"],
            "allow_headers": ["Content-Type", "Authorization"]
        }
    })

    # Database configuration
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = os.getenv('DATABASE_URL', 'sqlite:///jobmanagement.db')
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
    app.config['SECRET_KEY'] = os.getenv('SECRET_KEY', 'dev-secret-key')

    # Initialize extensions
    db.init_app(app)
    migrate = Migrate(app, db)

    # Register blueprints
    app.register_blueprint(api, url_prefix='/api')

    # Create database tables and default admin
    with app.app_context():
        db.create_all()
        create_default_admin()

    @app.route('/health')
    def health_check():
        return {'status': 'healthy'}, 200

    return app

app = create_app()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run(debug=True, port=5000)

                color 0.3s ease, 
                border-color 0.3s ease, 
                box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

/* Common Theme Classes */
.theme-bg-primary {
    background-color: var(--bg-primary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.theme-bg-secondary {
    background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.theme-text-primary {
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.theme-text-secondary {
    color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.theme-border {
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.theme-card {
    background-color: var(--card-bg);
    border: 1px solid var(--card-border);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px var(--shadow-color);
}

.theme-button-primary {
    background-color: var(--accent-primary);
    color: var(--bg-primary);
    border: none;
    padding: 12px 24px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.theme-button-primary:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 12px var(--shadow-color);
}

.theme-button-secondary {
    background-color: transparent;
    color: var(--text-primary);
    border: 2px solid var(--accent-primary);
    padding: 12px 24px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.theme-button-secondary:hover {
    background-color: var(--accent-primary);
    color: var(--bg-primary);
}

.theme-input {
    background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
    border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
    padding: 12px 16px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.theme-input:focus {
    border-color: var(--accent-primary);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px var(--accent-primary-15);
    outline: none;
}

/* Status Classes */
.theme-status-success {
    color: var(--status-success);
}

.theme-status-warning {
    color: var(--status-warning);
}

.theme-status-error {
    color: var(--status-error);
}

.theme-status-info {
    color: var(--status-info);
}

/* Animation Classes */
.theme-hover-scale {
    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.theme-hover-scale:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
}

/* Gradient Text for Dark Mode */
:root[data-theme="dark"] .theme-gradient-text {
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--accent-primary), var(--accent-secondary));
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    background-clip: text;
    color: transparent;
}

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Login.css';

const Login = () => {
    const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
    const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
    const [error, setError] = useState('');
    const navigate = useNavigate();

    const handleLogin = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const response = await axios.post('/api/login', { username, password });
            localStorage.setItem('token', response.data.token);
            navigate('/dashboard');
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Invalid username or password');
        }
    };

    return (
        <div className="login-container theme-bg-primary">
            <div className="form-section theme-card">
                <div className="form-header">
                    <h2 className="theme-gradient-text">Welcome Back</h2>
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">Enter your credentials to access your account</p>
                </div>
                
                <form onSubmit={handleLogin} className="login-form">
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Username</label>
                        <input 
                            type="text" 
                            className="theme-input"
                            placeholder="Enter your username" 
                            value={username} 
                            onChange={(e) => setUsername(e.target.value)} 
                            required 
                        />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                        <input 
                            type="password" 
                            className="theme-input"
                            placeholder="Enter your password" 
                            value={password} 
                            onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)} 
                            required 
                        />
                    </div>

                    {error && <div className="error-message theme-status-error">{error}</div>}

                    <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary login-button">
                        Sign In
                    </button>
                </form>

                <div className="form-footer">
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">
                        Don't have an account? 
                        <a href="/register" className="theme-text-accent">Register here</a>
                    </p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div className="image-section">
                <div className="brand-logo">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">work</span>
                    <h1 className="theme-gradient-text">JobManager</h1>
                </div>
                <p className="theme-text-secondary">Streamline your workflow, boost productivity</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Login;
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
import React, { useEffect } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { ThemeProvider, useTheme } from './context/ThemeContext';
import Navbar from './components/Navbar';
import Login from './components/Login';
import LandingPage from './components/LandingPage';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';
import Tasks from './components/Tasks';
import Projects from './components/Projects';
import Employees from './components/Employees';
import './App.css';
import './styles/theme.css';

// Theme wrapper component to apply theme class to body
const ThemeWrapper = ({ children }) => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();

    useEffect(() => {
        // Apply theme to document root
        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
        // Apply theme-specific background to body
        document.body.style.backgroundColor = `var(--bg-primary)`;
        document.body.style.color = `var(--text-primary)`;
    }, [isDarkMode]);

    return children;
};

// Protected Route Component
const ProtectedRoute = ({ children }) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
    if (!token) {
        return <Navigate to="/login" replace />;
    }
    return children;
};

const App = () => {
    return (
        <ThemeProvider>
            <ThemeWrapper>
                <Router>
                    <div className="app-container theme-bg-primary">
                        <Navbar />
                        <main className="main-content">
                            <Routes>
                                <Route path="/" element={<LandingPage />} />
                                <Route path="/login" element={<Login />} />
                                <Route 
                                    path="/dashboard" 
                                    element={
                                        <ProtectedRoute>
                                            <Dashboard />
                                        </ProtectedRoute>
                                    } 
                                />
                                <Route 
                                    path="/tasks" 
                                    element={
                                        <ProtectedRoute>
                                            <Tasks />
                                        </ProtectedRoute>
                                    } 
                                />
                                <Route 
                                    path="/projects" 
                                    element={
                                        <ProtectedRoute>
                                            <Projects />
                                        </ProtectedRoute>
                                    } 
                                />
                                <Route 
                                    path="/employees" 
                                    element={
                                        <ProtectedRoute>
                                            <Employees />
                                        </ProtectedRoute>
                                    } 
                                />
                                <Route path="*" element={<Navigate to="/" replace />} />
                            </Routes>
                        </main>
                    </div>
                </Router>
            </ThemeWrapper>
        </ThemeProvider>
    );
};

export default App;
</content>
</create_file>

/* Reset default styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Import Google Material Icons */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons');
/* Import Google Fonts */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap');

/* Base styles */
body {
    font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    line-height: 1.5;
    min-height: 100vh;
}

/* App Container */
.app-container {
    min-height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

/* Main Content */
.main-content {
    flex: 1;
    padding-top: 64px; /* Height of navbar */
    min-height: calc(100vh - 64px);
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 1440px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    position: relative;
}

/* Scrollbar Styling */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: var(--bg-secondary);
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: var(--border-color);
    border-radius: 4px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: var(--text-tertiary);
}

/* Loading Animation */
.loading-spinner {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 3px solid var(--border-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-top-color: var(--accent-primary);
    animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    to {
        transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
}

/* Page Transitions */
.page-transition-enter {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(20px);
}

.page-transition-enter-active {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
    transition: opacity 300ms, transform 300ms;
}

.page-transition-exit {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.page-transition-exit-active {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(-20px);
    transition: opacity 300ms, transform 300ms;
}

/* Grid Layout */
.grid-container {
    display: grid;
    gap: 1.5rem;
    padding: 1.5rem;
}

/* Card Styles */
.card {
    background-color: var(--card-bg);
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px var(--shadow-color);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 12px var(--shadow-color);
}

/* Button Styles */
.button {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/* Form Styles */
.form-control {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.form-control label {
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
}

/* Responsive Grid */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
    .main-content {
        padding: 64px 1rem 1rem 1rem;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .grid-container {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        padding: 1rem;
    }
}

/* Dark Mode Specific Styles */
[data-theme="dark"] .card {
    background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.8);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

[data-theme="dark"] .button {
    background: linear-gradient(
        45deg,
        var(--accent-primary),
        var(--accent-secondary)
    );
}

/* Animation Classes */
.fade-in {
    animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease-in;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
    }
}

.slide-up {
    animation: slideUp 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slideUp {
    from {
        transform: translateY(20px);
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        transform: translateY(0);
        opacity: 1;
    }
}
</content>

}

    box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 255, 209, 0.1);
}

<content>
import React, { createContext, useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react';

const ThemeContext = createContext();

export const useTheme = () => {
    const context = useContext(ThemeContext);
    if (!context) {
        throw new Error('useTheme must be used within a ThemeProvider');
    }
    return context;
};

export const ThemeProvider = ({ children }) => {
    // Get initial theme from localStorage or default to light
    const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(() => {
        const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
        return savedTheme === 'dark';
    });

    // Update theme in localStorage and document whenever it changes
    useEffect(() => {
        // Save theme preference
        localStorage.setItem('theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
        
        // Update document theme
        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', isDarkMode ? 'dark' : 'light');
        
        // Update body background and text color
        document.body.style.backgroundColor = `var(--bg-primary)`;
        document.body.style.color = `var(--text-primary)`;
        
        // Add/remove dark mode class from body
        if (isDarkMode) {
            document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
        } else {
            document.body.classList.remove('dark-mode');
        }
    }, [isDarkMode]);

    const toggleTheme = () => {
        setIsDarkMode(prev => !prev);
    };

    // Apply theme immediately on mount
    useEffect(() => {
        const root = document.documentElement;
        const initialTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light';
        root.setAttribute('data-theme', initialTheme);
        if (initialTheme === 'dark') {
            document.body.classList.add('dark-mode');
        }
    }, []);

    const value = {
        isDarkMode,
        toggleTheme
    };

    return (
        <ThemeContext.Provider value={value}>
            {children}
        </ThemeContext.Provider>
    );
};

export default ThemeContext;
</content>
</create_file>

from flask import Blueprint, request, jsonify
from werkzeug.security import generate_password_hash, check_password_hash
from functools import wraps
from models import db, User, Employee, Task, Project
import jwt
import os
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

api = Blueprint('api', __name__)

def token_required(f):
    @wraps(f)
    def decorated(*args, **kwargs):
        token = request.headers.get('Authorization')
        if not token:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is missing'}), 401

        try:
            token = token.split(' ')[1]  # Remove 'Bearer ' prefix
            data = jwt.decode(token, os.getenv('SECRET_KEY', 'dev-secret-key'), algorithms=["HS256"])
            current_user = User.query.get(data['user_id'])
            if not current_user:
                return jsonify({'message': 'User not found'}), 401
            
        except Exception as e:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is invalid'}), 401

        return f(current_user, *args, **kwargs)
    return decorated

@api.route('/login', methods=['POST'])
def login():
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if not data or not data.get('username') or not data.get('password'):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Missing username or password'}), 400

    user = User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first()
    
    if not user or not user.check_password(data['password']):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Invalid username or password'}), 401

    # Generate JWT token
    token = jwt.encode({
        'user_id': user.id,
        'username': user.username,
        'exp': datetime.utcnow() + timedelta(hours=24)
    }, os.getenv('SECRET_KEY', 'dev-secret-key'), algorithm="HS256")
    
    return jsonify({
        'token': token,
        'user': {
            'id': user.id,
            'username': user.username,
            'role': user.role
        }
    }), 200

@api.route('/register', methods=['POST'])
def register():
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if not all(k in data for k in ('username', 'email', 'password')):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Missing required fields'}), 400

    if User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first():
        return jsonify({'message': 'Username already exists'}), 400

    if User.query.filter_by(email=data['email']).first():
        return jsonify({'message': 'Email already exists'}), 400

    user = User(
        username=data['username'],
        email=data['email'],
        role=data.get('role', 'employee')
    )
    user.set_password(data['password'])
    
    db.session.add(user)
    db.session.commit()

    # Create employee profile if role is employee
    if user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee(
            user_id=user.id,
            name=data.get('name', data['username']),
            position=data.get('position', ''),
            department=data.get('department', '')
        )
        db.session.add(employee)
        db.session.commit()

    return jsonify({
        'message': 'User created successfully',
        'user_id': user.id
    }), 201

@api.route('/user/profile', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_profile(current_user):
    if current_user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee.query.filter_by(user_id=current_user.id).first()
        return jsonify({
            'id': current_user.id,
            'username': current_user.username,
            'email': current_user.email,
            'role': current_user.role,
            'employee_details': {
                'name': employee.name if employee else None,
                'position': employee.position if employee else None,
                'department': employee.department if employee else None,
                'hire_date': employee.hire_date.isoformat() if employee and employee.hire_date else None
            }
        })
    
    return jsonify({
        'id': current_user.id,
        'username': current_user.username,
        'email': current_user.email,
        'role': current_user.role
    })

@api.route('/user/profile', methods=['PUT'])
@token_required
def update_profile(current_user):
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if 'email' in data and data['email'] != current_user.email:
        if User.query.filter_by(email=data['email']).first():
            return jsonify({'message': 'Email already exists'}), 400
        current_user.email = data['email']
    
    if 'password' in data:
        current_user.set_password(data['password'])
    
    if current_user.role == 'employee':
        employee = Employee.query.filter_by(user_id=current_user.id).first()
        if employee:
            if 'name' in data:
                employee.name = data['name']
            if 'position' in data:
                employee.position = data['position']
            if 'department' in data:
                employee.department = data['department']
    
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Profile updated successfully'})

# Error handlers
@api.errorhandler(400)
def bad_request(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Bad request'}), 400

@api.errorhandler(401)
def unauthorized(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Unauthorized'}), 401

@api.errorhandler(403)
def forbidden(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Forbidden'}), 403

@api.errorhandler(404)
def not_found(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Not found'}), 404

@api.errorhandler(500)
def internal_server_error(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Internal server error'}), 500

from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
from werkzeug.security import generate_password_hash, check_password_hash
from datetime import datetime

db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    __tablename__ = 'users'
    
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)
    email = db.Column(db.String(120), unique=True, nullable=False)
    password_hash = db.Column(db.String(256), nullable=False)
    role = db.Column(db.String(20), nullable=False, default='employee')
    created_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow)
    updated_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow, onupdate=datetime.utcnow)

    def set_password(self, password):
        self.password_hash = generate_password_hash(password)

    def check_password(self, password):
        return check_password_hash(self.password_hash, password)

class Employee(db.Model):
    __tablename__ = 'employees'
    
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    user_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('users.id'), nullable=False)
    name = db.Column(db.String(100), nullable=False)
    position = db.Column(db.String(100))
    department = db.Column(db.String(100))
    hire_date = db.Column(db.DateTime, default=datetime.utcnow)
    created_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow)
    updated_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow, onupdate=datetime.utcnow)

    user = db.relationship('User', backref=db.backref('employee', uselist=False))
    tasks = db.relationship('Task', backref='employee', lazy=True)

class Project(db.Model):
    __tablename__ = 'projects'
    
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    name = db.Column(db.String(100), nullable=False)
    description = db.Column(db.Text)
    start_date = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    end_date = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    status = db.Column(db.String(20), default='pending')
    created_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow)
    updated_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow, onupdate=datetime.utcnow)

    tasks = db.relationship('Task', backref='project', lazy=True)

class Task(db.Model):
    __tablename__ = 'tasks'
    
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(100), nullable=False)
    description = db.Column(db.Text)
    status = db.Column(db.String(20), default='pending')
    priority = db.Column(db.String(20), default='medium')
    due_date = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    employee_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('employees.id'))
    project_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('projects.id'))
    created_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow)
    updated_at = db.Column(db.DateTime, nullable=False, default=datetime.utcnow, onupdate=datetime.utcnow)
</content>

}

    box-shadow: 0 4px 12px var(--shadow-color);
}

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Login.css';

const Login = () => {
    const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
    const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
    const [error, setError] = useState('');
    const navigate = useNavigate();

    const handleLogin = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const response = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/login', { 
                username, 
                password 
            });
            localStorage.setItem('token', response.data.token);
            localStorage.setItem('user', JSON.stringify(response.data.user));
            navigate('/dashboard');
        } catch (err) {
            console.error('Login error:', err);
            setError('Invalid username or password');
        }
    };

    return (
        <div className="login-container theme-bg-primary">
            <div className="form-section theme-card">
                <div className="form-header">
                    <h2 className="theme-gradient-text">Welcome Back</h2>
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">Enter your credentials to access your account</p>
                </div>
                
                <form onSubmit={handleLogin} className="login-form">
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Username</label>
                        <input 
                            type="text" 
                            className="theme-input"
                            placeholder="Enter your username" 
                            value={username} 
                            onChange={(e) => setUsername(e.target.value)} 
                            required 
                        />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                        <input 
                            type="password" 
                            className="theme-input"
                            placeholder="Enter your password" 
                            value={password} 
                            onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)} 
                            required 
                        />
                    </div>

                    {error && <div className="error-message theme-status-error">{error}</div>}

                    <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary login-button">
                        Sign In
                    </button>
                </form>

                <div className="form-footer">
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">
                        Don't have an account? 
                        <a href="/register" className="theme-text-accent">Register here</a>
                    </p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div className="image-section">
                <div className="brand-logo">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">work</span>
                    <h1 className="theme-gradient-text">JobManager</h1>
                </div>
                <p className="theme-text-secondary">Streamline your workflow, boost productivity</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Login;
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import {
    Chart as ChartJS,
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    PointElement,
    LineElement,
    BarElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend,
    ArcElement,
} from 'chart.js';
import { Line, Bar, Doughnut } from 'react-chartjs-2';
import './Dashboard.css';

// Register ChartJS components
ChartJS.register(
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    PointElement,
    LineElement,
    BarElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend,
    ArcElement
);

const Dashboard = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [stats, setStats] = useState({
        totalTasks: 0,
        completedTasks: 0,
        pendingTasks: 0,
        totalProjects: 0,
        totalEmployees: 0
    });
    const [recentActivities, setRecentActivities] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);

    const chartColors = isDarkMode ? {
        primary: '#00FFD1',
        secondary: '#FF3366',
        tertiary: '#FFD100',
        quaternary: '#7C4DFF',
        text: '#FFFFFF',
        grid: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)'
    } : {
        primary: '#1a73e8',
        secondary: '#34A853',
        tertiary: '#FBBC05',
        quaternary: '#EA4335',
        text: '#202124',
        grid: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
    };

    useEffect(() => {
        const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
            try {
                const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
                const [statsRes, activitiesRes] = await Promise.all([
                    axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/dashboard/stats', {
                        headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
                    }),
                    axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/dashboard/activities', {
                        headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
                    })
                ]);

                setStats(statsRes.data);
                setRecentActivities(activitiesRes.data);
                setLoading(false);
            } catch (err) {
                setError('Failed to load dashboard data');
                setLoading(false);
            }
        };

        fetchDashboardData();
    }, []);

    const taskProgressData = {
        labels: ['Completed', 'Pending'],
        datasets: [{
            data: [stats.completedTasks, stats.pendingTasks],
            backgroundColor: [chartColors.primary, chartColors.secondary],
            borderColor: [chartColors.primary, chartColors.secondary],
            borderWidth: 1
        }]
    };

    const projectTrendsData = {
        labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'],
        datasets: [{
            label: 'Project Progress',
            data: [65, 59, 80, 81, 56, 55],
            fill: false,
            borderColor: chartColors.primary,
            tension: 0.4
        }]
    };

    const employeePerformanceData = {
        labels: ['Team A', 'Team B', 'Team C', 'Team D'],
        datasets: [{
            label: 'Tasks Completed',
            data: [12, 19, 3, 5],
            backgroundColor: [
                chartColors.primary,
                chartColors.secondary,
                chartColors.tertiary,
                chartColors.quaternary
            ]
        }]
    };

    const chartOptions = {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        plugins: {
            legend: {
                labels: {
                    color: chartColors.text
                }
            }
        },
        scales: {
            x: {
                grid: {
                    color: chartColors.grid
                },
                ticks: {
                    color: chartColors.text
                }
            },
            y: {
                grid: {
                    color: chartColors.grid
                },
                ticks: {
                    color: chartColors.text
                }
            }
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`dashboard-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="stats-overview">
                <div className="stat-card theme-card">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">assignment</span>
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Total Tasks</h3>
                    <p className="theme-gradient-text">{stats.totalTasks}</p>
                </div>
                <div className="stat-card theme-card">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">folder</span>
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Projects</h3>
                    <p className="theme-gradient-text">{stats.totalProjects}</p>
                </div>
                <div className="stat-card theme-card">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">people</span>
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Employees</h3>
                    <p className="theme-gradient-text">{stats.totalEmployees}</p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div className="charts-grid">
                <div className="chart-card theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Task Progress</h3>
                    <div className="chart-container">
                        <Doughnut data={taskProgressData} options={chartOptions} />
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div className="chart-card theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Project Trends</h3>
                    <div className="chart-container">
                        <Line data={projectTrendsData} options={chartOptions} />
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div className="chart-card theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Team Performance</h3>
                    <div className="chart-container">
                        <Bar data={employeePerformanceData} options={chartOptions} />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div className="recent-activities theme-card">
                <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Recent Activities</h3>
                <div className="activities-list">
                    {recentActivities.map((activity, index) => (
                        <div key={index} className="activity-item">
                            <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">{activity.icon}</span>
                            <div className="activity-details">
                                <p className="theme-text-primary">{activity.description}</p>
                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">{activity.timestamp}</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    ))}
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Dashboard;
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
.dashboard-container {
    padding: 2rem;
    min-height: calc(100vh - 64px);
}

.stats-overview {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.stat-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
    border-radius: 12px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    text-align: center;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.stat-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.stat-card .material-icons {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.stat-card h3 {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.stat-card p {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.charts-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.chart-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
    border-radius: 12px;
}

.chart-card h3 {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.chart-container {
    height: 300px;
    position: relative;
}

.recent-activities {
    padding: 1.5rem;
    border-radius: 12px;
}

.recent-activities h3 {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.activities-list {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.activity-item {

}

from flask import Blueprint, request, jsonify
from werkzeug.security import generate_password_hash, check_password_hash
from functools import wraps
from models import db, User, Employee, Task, Project
import jwt
import os
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from sqlalchemy import func

api = Blueprint('api', __name__)

def token_required(f):
    @wraps(f)
    def decorated(*args, **kwargs):
        token = request.headers.get('Authorization')
        if not token:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is missing'}), 401

        try:
            token = token.split(' ')[1]  # Remove 'Bearer ' prefix
            data = jwt.decode(token, os.getenv('SECRET_KEY', 'dev-secret-key'), algorithms=["HS256"])
            current_user = User.query.get(data['user_id'])
            if not current_user:
                return jsonify({'message': 'User not found'}), 401
            
        except Exception as e:
            return jsonify({'message': 'Token is invalid'}), 401

        return f(current_user, *args, **kwargs)
    return decorated

@api.route('/login', methods=['POST'])
def login():
    data = request.get_json()
    
    if not data or not data.get('username') or not data.get('password'):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Missing username or password'}), 400

    user = User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first()
    
    if not user or not user.check_password(data['password']):
        return jsonify({'message': 'Invalid username or password'}), 401

    # Generate JWT token
    token = jwt.encode({
        'user_id': user.id,
        'username': user.username,
        'exp': datetime.utcnow() + timedelta(hours=24)
    }, os.getenv('SECRET_KEY', 'dev-secret-key'), algorithm="HS256")
    
    return jsonify({
        'token': token,
        'user': {
            'id': user.id,
            'username': user.username,
            'role': user.role
        }
    }), 200

@api.route('/dashboard/stats', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_dashboard_stats(current_user):
    try:
        total_tasks = Task.query.count()
        completed_tasks = Task.query.filter_by(status='completed').count()
        pending_tasks = Task.query.filter_by(status='pending').count()
        total_projects = Project.query.count()
        total_employees = Employee.query.count()

        return jsonify({
            'totalTasks': total_tasks,
            'completedTasks': completed_tasks,
            'pendingTasks': pending_tasks,
            'totalProjects': total_projects,
            'totalEmployees': total_employees
        }), 200
    except Exception as e:
        return jsonify({'message': 'Error fetching dashboard stats', 'error': str(e)}), 500

@api.route('/dashboard/activities', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_recent_activities(current_user):
    try:
        # Get recent tasks
        recent_tasks = Task.query.order_by(Task.updated_at.desc()).limit(5).all()
        
        # Get recent projects
        recent_projects = Project.query.order_by(Project.updated_at.desc()).limit(5).all()
        
        activities = []
        
        for task in recent_tasks:
            activities.append({
                'type': 'task',
                'icon': 'assignment',
                'description': f'Task "{task.title}" was updated',
                'timestamp': task.updated_at.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
            })
            
        for project in recent_projects:
            activities.append({
                'type': 'project',
                'icon': 'folder',
                'description': f'Project "{project.name}" was updated',
                'timestamp': project.updated_at.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
            })
            
        # Sort activities by timestamp
        activities.sort(key=lambda x: datetime.strptime(x['timestamp'], '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), reverse=True)
        
        return jsonify(activities[:10]), 200
    except Exception as e:
        return jsonify({'message': 'Error fetching recent activities', 'error': str(e)}), 500

@api.route('/tasks', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_tasks(current_user):
    try:
        tasks = Task.query.all()
        return jsonify([{
            'id': task.id,
            'title': task.title,
            'description': task.description,
            'status': task.status,
            'priority': task.priority,
            'due_date': task.due_date.isoformat() if task.due_date else None,
            'employee_id': task.employee_id,
            'project_id': task.project_id
        } for task in tasks]), 200
    except Exception as e:
        return jsonify({'message': 'Error fetching tasks', 'error': str(e)}), 500

@api.route('/projects', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_projects(current_user):
    try:
        projects = Project.query.all()
        return jsonify([{
            'id': project.id,
            'name': project.name,
            'description': project.description,
            'start_date': project.start_date.isoformat() if project.start_date else None,
            'end_date': project.end_date.isoformat() if project.end_date else None,
            'status': project.status
        } for project in projects]), 200
    except Exception as e:
        return jsonify({'message': 'Error fetching projects', 'error': str(e)}), 500

@api.route('/employees', methods=['GET'])
@token_required
def get_employees(current_user):
    try:
        employees = Employee.query.all()
        return jsonify([{
            'id': employee.id,
            'name': employee.name,
            'position': employee.position,
            'department': employee.department,
            'hire_date': employee.hire_date.isoformat() if employee.hire_date else None
        } for employee in employees]), 200
    except Exception as e:
        return jsonify({'message': 'Error fetching employees', 'error': str(e)}), 500

# Error handlers
@api.errorhandler(400)
def bad_request(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Bad request'}), 400

@api.errorhandler(401)
def unauthorized(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Unauthorized'}), 401

@api.errorhandler(403)
def forbidden(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Forbidden'}), 403

@api.errorhandler(404)
def not_found(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Not found'}), 404

@api.errorhandler(500)
def internal_server_error(error):
    return jsonify({'message': 'Internal server error'}), 500

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Tasks.css';

const Tasks = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({
        title: '',
        description: '',
        priority: 'medium',
        due_date: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchTasks();
    }, []);

    const fetchTasks = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setTasks(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load tasks');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddTask = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', newTask, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewTask({
                title: '',
                description: '',
                priority: 'medium',
                due_date: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add task');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (taskId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/${taskId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update task status');
        }
    };

    const getPriorityColor = (priority) => {
        switch (priority) {
            case 'high':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            case 'medium':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'low':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`tasks-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="tasks-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Tasks Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-task-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Task
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-task-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Task</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddTask}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Title</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.title}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, title: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Priority</label>
                            <select
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.priority}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, priority: e.target.value})}
                            >
                                <option value="low">Low</option>
                                <option value="medium">Medium</option>
                                <option value="high">High</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Due Date</label>
                            <input
                                type="date"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.due_date}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, due_date: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Task</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="tasks-grid">
                {tasks.map(task => (
                    <div key={task.id} className="task-card theme-card">
                        <div className="task-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{task.title}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="priority-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getPriorityColor(task.priority) }}
                            >
                                {task.priority}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{task.description}</p>
                        <div className="task-meta">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Due: {new Date(task.due_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={task.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(task.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Tasks;
</content>
</create_file>

from flask import Flask
from flask_cors import CORS
from models import db, User
from routes import api
from werkzeug.security import generate_password_hash
import os

app = Flask(__name__)
CORS(app, resources={r"/api/*": {"origins": "http://localhost:3000"}})

# Database configuration
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'sqlite:///jobmanager.db'
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
app.config['SECRET_KEY'] = os.getenv('SECRET_KEY', 'dev-secret-key')

# Initialize extensions
db.init_app(app)

# Register blueprints
app.register_blueprint(api, url_prefix='/api')

def create_default_admin():
    """Create a default admin user if no users exist."""
    with app.app_context():
        if not User.query.first():
            admin = User(
                username='admin',
                email='admin@example.com',
                role='admin'
            )
            admin.set_password('admin123')
            db.session.add(admin)
            db.session.commit()
            print('Default admin user created')

def init_db():
    """Initialize the database."""
    with app.app_context():
        db.create_all()
        create_default_admin()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    init_db()
    app.run(debug=True)
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import './Navbar.css';

const Navbar = () => {
    const { isDarkMode, toggleTheme } = useTheme();
    const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false);
    const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
    const [showMobileMenu, setShowMobileMenu] = useState(false);
    const navigate = useNavigate();
    const location = useLocation();

    useEffect(() => {
        const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
        const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}');
        setIsLoggedIn(!!token);
        setUsername(user.username || '');
    }, [location]);

    const handleLogout = () => {
        localStorage.removeItem('token');
        localStorage.removeItem('user');
        setIsLoggedIn(false);
        setUsername('');
        navigate('/');
    };

    const toggleMobileMenu = () => {
        setShowMobileMenu(!showMobileMenu);
    };

    return (
        <nav className={`navbar theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="navbar-brand">
                <Link to="/" className="logo">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">work</span>
                    <span className="theme-gradient-text">JobManager</span>
                </Link>
            </div>

            <div className="navbar-mobile-toggle" onClick={toggleMobileMenu}>
                <span className="material-icons theme-text-primary">
                    {showMobileMenu ? 'close' : 'menu'}
                </span>
            </div>

            <div className={`navbar-menu ${showMobileMenu ? 'active' : ''}`}>
                {isLoggedIn ? (
                    <>
                        <Link to="/dashboard" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">dashboard</span>
                            Dashboard
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/tasks" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">assignment</span>
                            Tasks
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/projects" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">folder</span>
                            Projects
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/employees" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">people</span>
                            Employees
                        </Link>
                    </>
                ) : (
                    <>
                        <Link to="/about" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">About</Link>
                        <Link to="/features" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">Features</Link>
                        <Link to="/pricing" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">Pricing</Link>
                    </>
                )}
            </div>

            <div className="navbar-end">
                <button 
                    className="theme-toggle-btn"
                    onClick={toggleTheme}
                    title={isDarkMode ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons theme-text-primary">
                        {isDarkMode ? 'light_mode' : 'dark_mode'}
                    </span>
                </button>

                {isLoggedIn ? (
                    <div className="user-menu">
                        <div className="user-info theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">account_circle</span>
                            <span>{username}</span>
                        </div>
                        <button 
                            onClick={handleLogout}
                            className="theme-button-secondary logout-btn"
                        >
                            <span className="material-icons">logout</span>
                            Logout
                        </button>
                    </div>
                ) : (
                    <div className="auth-buttons">
                        <Link to="/login" className="theme-button-primary">Login</Link>
                        <Link to="/register" className="theme-button-secondary">Register</Link>
                    </div>
                )}
            </div>
        </nav>
    );
};

export default Navbar;
</content>
</create_file>
