<content>
import React from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { ThemeProvider } from './context/ThemeContext';
import Navbar from './components/Navbar';
import LandingPage from './components/LandingPage';
import Login from './components/Login';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';
import Tasks from './components/Tasks';
import Projects from './components/Projects';
import Employees from './components/Employees';
import './App.css';

const PrivateRoute = ({ children }) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
    return token ? children : <Navigate to="/login" />;
};

const App = () => {
    return (
        <ThemeProvider>
            <Router>
                <div className="app">
                    <Navbar />
                    <main className="main-content">
                        <Routes>
                            <Route path="/" element={<LandingPage />} />
                            <Route path="/login" element={<Login />} />
                            <Route 
                                path="/dashboard" 
                                element={
                                    <PrivateRoute>
                                        <Dashboard />
                                    </PrivateRoute>
                                } 
                            />
                            <Route 
                                path="/tasks" 
                                element={
                                    <PrivateRoute>
                                        <Tasks />
                                    </PrivateRoute>
                                } 
                            />
                            <Route 
                                path="/projects" 
                                element={
                                    <PrivateRoute>
                                        <Projects />
                                    </PrivateRoute>
                                } 
                            />
                            <Route 
                                path="/employees" 
                                element={
                                    <PrivateRoute>
                                        <Employees />
                                    </PrivateRoute>
                                } 
                            />
                        </Routes>
                    </main>
                </div>
            </Router>
        </ThemeProvider>
    );
};

export default App;
</content>
</create_file>

/* Reset and Base Styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen,
        Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    background-color: var(--bg-primary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* App Layout */
.app {
    min-height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

.main-content {
    margin-top: 64px; /* Height of navbar */
    flex: 1;
    position: relative;
}

/* Scrollbar Styles */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: var(--bg-secondary);
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: var(--border-color);
    border-radius: 4px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: var(--text-tertiary);
}

/* Theme Transitions */
body,
.app * {
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease,
                color 0.3s ease,
                border-color 0.3s ease,
                box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

/* Material Icons */
.material-icons {
    font-family: 'Material Icons';
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
    font-size: 24px;
    line-height: 1;
    letter-spacing: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    display: inline-block;
    white-space: nowrap;
    word-wrap: normal;
    direction: ltr;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
}

/* Common Components */
.loading-spinner {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 3px solid var(--border-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-top-color: var(--accent-primary);
    animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

@keyframes spin {
    to {
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg);
    }
}

.error-message {
    color: var(--status-error);
    text-align: center;
    padding: 2rem;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Theme-specific styles */
.theme-card {
    background-color: var(--card-bg);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 6px var(--shadow-color);
}

.theme-gradient-text {
    background: linear-gradient(
        135deg,
        var(--accent-primary) 0%,
        var(--accent-secondary) 100%
    );
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
}

/* Dark mode enhancements */
.dark-mode .theme-card {
    background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.8);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.dark-mode .theme-gradient-text {
    background: linear-gradient(
        135deg,
        var(--accent-primary) 0%,
        var(--accent-quaternary) 100%
    );
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .main-content {
        padding: 1rem;
    }
}

/* Utility Classes */
.visually-hidden {
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    padding: 0;
    margin: -1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    white-space: nowrap;
    border: 0;
}

.text-center {
    text-align: center;
}

.mt-1 { margin-top: 0.5rem; }
.mt-2 { margin-top: 1rem; }
.mt-3 { margin-top: 1.5rem; }
.mt-4 { margin-top: 2rem; }

.mb-1 { margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }
.mb-2 { margin-bottom: 1rem; }
.mb-3 { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 2rem; }

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import {
    Chart as ChartJS,
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    BarElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend,
} from 'chart.js';
import { Bar } from 'react-chartjs-2';
import './Dashboard.css';

// Register ChartJS components
ChartJS.register(CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend);

const Dashboard = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [stats, setStats] = useState({
        totalTasks: 0,
        completedTasks: 0,
        pendingTasks: 0,
        totalProjects: 0,
        totalEmployees: 0
    });
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);

    useEffect(() => {
        const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
            try {
                const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
                const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/dashboard/stats', {
                    headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
                });
                setStats(response.data);
                setLoading(false);
            } catch (err) {
                setError('Failed to load dashboard data');
                setLoading(false);
            }
        };

        fetchDashboardData();
    }, []);

    const chartData = {
        labels: ['Completed', 'Pending'],
        datasets: [{
            label: 'Task Status',
            data: [stats.completedTasks, stats.pendingTasks],
            backgroundColor: isDarkMode ? '#00FFD1' : '#4285F4',
            borderColor: isDarkMode ? '#00FFD1' : '#4285F4',
            borderWidth: 1
        }]
    };

    const chartOptions = {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        plugins: {
            legend: {
                labels: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? '#FFFFFF' : '#202124'
                }
            }
        },
        scales: {
            x: {
                grid: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)' : 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
                },
                ticks: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? '#FFFFFF' : '#202124'
                }
            },
            y: {
                grid: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)' : 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
                },
                ticks: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? '#FFFFFF' : '#202124'
                }
            }
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`dashboard-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Dashboard</h2>
            <div className="charts-grid">
                <div className="chart-card theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Task Status</h3>
                    <Bar data={chartData} options={chartOptions} />
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Dashboard;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Tasks.css';

const Tasks = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({
        title: '',
        description: '',
        priority: 'medium',
        due_date: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchTasks();
    }, []);

    const fetchTasks = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setTasks(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load tasks');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddTask = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', newTask, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewTask({
                title: '',
                description: '',
                priority: 'medium',
                due_date: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add task');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (taskId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/${taskId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update task status');
        }
    };

    const getPriorityColor = (priority) => {
        switch (priority) {
            case 'high':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            case 'medium':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'low':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`tasks-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="tasks-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Tasks Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-task-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Task
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-task-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Task</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddTask}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Title</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.title}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, title: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Priority</label>
                            <select
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.priority}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, priority: e.target.value})}
                            >
                                <option value="low">Low</option>
                                <option value="medium">Medium</option>
                                <option value="high">High</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Due Date</label>
                            <input
                                type="date"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.due_date}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, due_date: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Task</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="tasks-grid">
                {tasks.map(task => (
                    <div key={task.id} className="task-card theme-card">
                        <div className="task-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{task.title}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="priority-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getPriorityColor(task.priority) }}
                            >
                                {task.priority}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{task.description}</p>
                        <div className="task-meta">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Due: {new Date(task.due_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={task.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(task.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Tasks;
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Projects.css';

const Projects = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newProject, setNewProject] = useState({
        name: '',
        description: '',
        start_date: '',
        end_date: '',
        status: 'pending'
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchProjects();
    }, []);

    const fetchProjects = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setProjects(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load projects');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddProject = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', newProject, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewProject({
                name: '',
                description: '',
                start_date: '',
                end_date: '',
                status: 'pending'
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add project');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (projectId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update project status');
        }
    };

    const getStatusColor = (status) => {
        switch (status) {
            case 'completed':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            case 'in_progress':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'pending':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`projects-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="projects-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Projects Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-project-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Project
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-project-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Project</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddProject}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Project Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Start Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.start_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, start_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">End Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.end_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, end_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Project</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="projects-grid">
                {projects.map(project => (
                    <div key={project.id} className="project-card theme-card">
                        <div className="project-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{project.name}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="status-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getStatusColor(project.status) }}
                            >
                                {project.status.replace('_', ' ')}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{project.description}</p>
                        <div className="project-dates">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Start: {new Date(project.start_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                End: {new Date(project.end_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <div className="project-actions">
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={project.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(project.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Projects;
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
.projects-container {
    padding: 2rem;
    min-height: calc(100vh - 64px);
}

.projects-header {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.projects-header h2 {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.add-project-btn {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
}

.add-project-btn .material-icons {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.projects-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.5rem;
}

.project-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
    border-radius: 12px;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.project-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.project-header {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: flex-start;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.project-header h3 {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-right: 1rem;
}

.status-badge {
    padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 20px;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--bg-primary);
    text-transform: capitalize;
}

.project-dates {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin: 1rem 0;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.project-actions {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    margin-top: 1rem;
}

.status-select {
    padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
    border-radius: 4px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    min-width: 120px;
}

/* Add Project Form */
.add-project-form {
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: 12px;
}

.add-project-form h3 {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.form-group {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group textarea,
.form-group select {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 8px;
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.form-group textarea {
    min-height: 100px;
    resize: vertical;
}

.form-row {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.form-actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    margin-top: 2rem;
}

/* Dark mode specific styles */
.dark-mode .project-card {
    background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.8);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.dark-mode .add-project-form {
    background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.8);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.dark-mode .form-group input,
.dark-mode .form-group textarea,
.dark-mode .form-group select,
.dark-mode .status-select {
    background-color: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.6);
    border-color: var(--border-color);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark-mode .form-group input:focus,
.dark-mode .form-group textarea:focus,
.dark-mode .form-group select:focus,
.dark-mode .status-select:focus {
    border-color: var(--accent-primary);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px var(--accent-primary-15);
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-spinner {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 3px solid var(--border-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-top-color: var(--accent-primary);
    animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

.error-message {
    color: var(--status-error);
    text-align: center;
    padding: 2rem;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .projects-container {
        padding: 1rem;
    }

    .projects-header {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: flex-start;
    }

    .projects-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .add-project-form {
        padding: 1.5rem;
    }

    .form-row {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .form-actions {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .form-actions button {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

/* Theme transitions */
.projects-container * {
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease,
                color 0.3s ease,
                border-color 0.3s ease,
                box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}
</content>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Employees.css';

const Employees = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState({
        name: '',
        position: '',
        department: '',
        email: '',
        password: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchEmployees();
    }, []);

    const fetchEmployees = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/employees', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setEmployees(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load employees');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddEmployee = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/employees', newEmployee, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewEmployee({
                name: '',
                position: '',
                department: '',
                email: '',
                password: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchEmployees();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add employee');
        }
    };

    const getDepartmentColor = (department) => {
        const colors = {
            'Engineering': 'var(--accent-primary)',
            'Marketing': 'var(--accent-secondary)',
            'Sales': 'var(--accent-tertiary)',
            'HR': 'var(--accent-quaternary)'
        };
        return colors[department] || 'var(--text-secondary)';
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`employees-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="employees-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Employee Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-employee-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">person_add</span>
                    Add Employee
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-employee-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Employee</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddEmployee}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Full Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Position</label>
                                <input
                                    type="text"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newEmployee.position}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, position: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Department</label>
                                <select
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newEmployee.department}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, department: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                >
                                    <option value="">Select Department</option>
                                    <option value="Engineering">Engineering</option>
                                    <option value="Marketing">Marketing</option>
                                    <option value="Sales">Sales</option>
                                    <option value="HR">HR</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Email</label>
                            <input
                                type="email"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.email}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, email: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                            <input
                                type="password"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.password}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, password: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Employee</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="employees-grid">
                {employees.map(employee => (
                    <div key={employee.id} className="employee-card theme-card">
                        <div className="employee-header">
                            <div className="employee-avatar">
                                <span className="material-icons">account_circle</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="employee-info">
                                <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{employee.name}</h3>
                                <p className="theme-text-secondary">{employee.position}</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="employee-details">
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">business</span>
                                <span 
                                    className="department-badge"
                                    style={{ backgroundColor: getDepartmentColor(employee.department) }}
                                >
                                    {employee.department}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">email</span>
                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">{employee.email}</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">calendar_today</span>
                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                    Joined: {new Date(employee.hire_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Employees;
</content>
</create_file>

<content>
.employees-container {
    padding: 2rem;
    min-height: calc(100vh - 64px);
}

.employees-header {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.employees-header h2 {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.add-employee-btn {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
}

.add-employee-btn .material-icons {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.employees-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.5rem;
}

.employee-card {
    padding: 1.5rem;
    border-radius: 12px;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.employee-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.employee-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.employee-avatar {
    width: 60px;
    height: 60px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-primary), var(--accent-secondary));
}

.employee-avatar .material-icons {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    color: var(--bg-primary);
}

.employee-info h3 {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.employee-info p {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.employee-details {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.detail-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
}

.detail-item .material-icons {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

.department-badge {
    padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 20px;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--bg-primary);
}

/* Add Employee Form */
.add-employee-form {
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: 12px;
}

.add-employee-form h3 {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.form-group {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.form-group label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.form-group input,
.form-group select {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 8px;
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
    font-size: 1rem;
}

.form-row {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.form-actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    margin-top: 2rem;
}

/* Dark mode specific styles */
.dark-mode .employee-card {
    background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.8);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.dark-mode .add-employee-form {
    background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.8);
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.dark-mode .form-group input,
.dark-mode .form-group select {
    background-color: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.6);
    border-color: var(--border-color);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.dark-mode .form-group input:focus,
.dark-mode .form-group select:focus {
    border-color: var(--accent-primary);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px var(--accent-primary-15);
}

/* Loading and Error States */
.loading-spinner {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 3px solid var(--border-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-top-color: var(--accent-primary);
    animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

.error-message {
    color: var(--status-error);
    text-align: center;
    padding: 2rem;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .employees-container {
        padding: 1rem;
    }

    .employees-header {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: flex-start;
    }

    .employees-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .add-employee-form {
        padding: 1.5rem;
    }

    .form-row {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .form-actions {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .form-actions button {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

/* Theme transitions */
.employees-container * {
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease,
                color 0.3s ease,
                border-color 0.3s ease,
                box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}
</content>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Projects.css';

const Projects = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newProject, setNewProject] = useState({
        name: '',
        description: '',
        start_date: '',
        end_date: '',
        status: 'pending'
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchProjects();
    }, []);

    const fetchProjects = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setProjects(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load projects');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddProject = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', newProject, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewProject({
                name: '',
                description: '',
                start_date: '',
                end_date: '',
                status: 'pending'
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add project');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (projectId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update project status');
        }
    };

    const getStatusColor = (status) => {
        switch (status) {
            case 'completed':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            case 'in_progress':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'pending':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`projects-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="projects-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Projects Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-project-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Project
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-project-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Project</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddProject}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Project Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Start Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.start_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, start_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">End Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.end_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, end_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Project</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="projects-grid">
                {projects.map(project => (
                    <div key={project.id} className="project-card theme-card">
                        <div className="project-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{project.name}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="status-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getStatusColor(project.status) }}
                            >
                                {project.status.replace('_', ' ')}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{project.description}</p>
                        <div className="project-dates">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Start: {new Date(project.start_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                End: {new Date(project.end_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <div className="project-actions">
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={project.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(project.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Projects;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Login.css';

const Login = () => {
    const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
    const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
    const [error, setError] = useState('');
    const navigate = useNavigate();

    const handleLogin = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const response = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/login', { 
                username, 
                password 
            });
            localStorage.setItem('token', response.data.token);
            localStorage.setItem('user', JSON.stringify(response.data.user));
            navigate('/dashboard');
        } catch (err) {
            console.error('Login error:', err);
            setError('Invalid username or password');
        }
    };

    return (
        <div className="login-container theme-bg-primary">
            <div className="form-section theme-card">
                <div className="form-header">
                    <h2 className="theme-gradient-text">Welcome Back</h2>
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">Enter your credentials to access your account</p>
                </div>
                
                <form onSubmit={handleLogin} className="login-form">
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Username</label>
                        <input 
                            type="text" 
                            className="theme-input"
                            placeholder="Enter your username" 
                            value={username} 
                            onChange={(e) => setUsername(e.target.value)} 
                            required 
                        />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                        <input 
                            type="password" 
                            className="theme-input"
                            placeholder="Enter your password" 
                            value={password} 
                            onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)} 
                            required 
                        />
                    </div>

                    {error && <div className="error-message theme-status-error">{error}</div>}

                    <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary login-button">
                        Sign In
                    </button>
                </form>

                <div className="form-footer">
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">
                        Don't have an account? 
                        <a href="/register" className="theme-text-accent">Register here</a>
                    </p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div className="image-section">
                <div className="brand-logo">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">work</span>
                    <h1 className="theme-gradient-text">JobManager</h1>
                </div>
                <p className="theme-text-secondary">Streamline your workflow, boost productivity</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Login;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Login.css';

const Login = () => {
    const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
    const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
    const [error, setError] = useState('');
    const navigate = useNavigate();

    const handleLogin = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const response = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/login', { 
                username, 
                password 
            });
            localStorage.setItem('token', response.data.token);
            localStorage.setItem('user', JSON.stringify(response.data.user));
            navigate('/dashboard');
        } catch (err) {
            console.error('Login error:', err);
            setError('Invalid username or password');
        }
    };

    return (
        <div className="login-container theme-bg-primary">
            <div className="form-section theme-card">
                <div className="form-header">
                    <h2 className="theme-gradient-text">Welcome Back</h2>
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">Enter your credentials to access your account</p>
                </div>
                
                <form onSubmit={handleLogin} className="login-form">
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Username</label>
                        <input 
                            type="text" 
                            className="theme-input"
                            placeholder="Enter your username" 
                            value={username} 
                            onChange={(e) => setUsername(e.target.value)} 
                            required 
                        />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="form-group">
                        <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                        <input 
                            type="password" 
                            className="theme-input"

                    </div>

                    {error && <div className="error-message theme-status-error">{error}</div>}

                    <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary login-button">

                    </button>
                </form>

                <div className="form-footer">
                    <p className="theme-text-secondary">

                        <a href="/register" className="theme-text-accent">Register here</a>

                </div>

            <div className="image-section">

                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">work</span>
                    <h1 className="theme-gradient-text">JobManager</h1>
                </div>
                <p className="theme-text-secondary">Streamline your workflow, boost productivity</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Login;

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import {
    Chart as ChartJS,
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    BarElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend,
} from 'chart.js';
import { Bar } from 'react-chartjs-2';
import './Dashboard.css';

// Register ChartJS components
ChartJS.register(CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend);

const Dashboard = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [stats, setStats] = useState({
        totalTasks: 0,
        completedTasks: 0,
        pendingTasks: 0,
        totalProjects: 0,
        totalEmployees: 0
    });
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);

    useEffect(() => {
        const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
            try {
                const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
                const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/dashboard/stats', {
                    headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
                });
                setStats(response.data);
                setLoading(false);
            } catch (err) {
                setError('Failed to load dashboard data');
                setLoading(false);
            }
        };

        fetchDashboardData();
    }, []);

    const chartData = {
        labels: ['Completed', 'Pending'],
        datasets: [{
            label: 'Task Status',
            data: [stats.completedTasks, stats.pendingTasks],
            backgroundColor: isDarkMode ? '#00FFD1' : '#4285F4',
            borderColor: isDarkMode ? '#00FFD1' : '#4285F4',
            borderWidth: 1
        }]
    };

    const chartOptions = {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        plugins: {
            legend: {
                labels: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? '#FFFFFF' : '#202124'
                }
            }
        },
        scales: {
            x: {
                grid: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)' : 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
                },
                ticks: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? '#FFFFFF' : '#202124'
                }
            },
            y: {
                grid: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)' : 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
                },
                ticks: {
                    color: isDarkMode ? '#FFFFFF' : '#202124'
                }
            }
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`dashboard-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Dashboard</h2>
            <div className="charts-grid">
                <div className="chart-card theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Task Status</h3>
                    <Bar data={chartData} options={chartOptions} />
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Dashboard;
</content>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Tasks.css';

const Tasks = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({
        title: '',
        description: '',
        priority: 'medium',
        due_date: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchTasks();
    }, []);

    const fetchTasks = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setTasks(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load tasks');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddTask = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', newTask, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewTask({
                title: '',
                description: '',
                priority: 'medium',
                due_date: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add task');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (taskId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/${taskId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update task status');
        }
    };

    const getPriorityColor = (priority) => {
        switch (priority) {
            case 'high':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            case 'medium':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'low':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`tasks-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="tasks-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Tasks Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-task-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Task
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-task-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Task</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddTask}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Title</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.title}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, title: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Priority</label>
                                <select
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newTask.priority}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, priority: e.target.value})}
                                >
                                    <option value="low">Low</option>
                                    <option value="medium">Medium</option>
                                    <option value="high">High</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Due Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newTask.due_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, due_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Task</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="tasks-grid">
                {tasks.map(task => (
                    <div key={task.id} className="task-card theme-card">
                        <div className="task-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{task.title}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="priority-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getPriorityColor(task.priority) }}
                            >
                                {task.priority}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{task.description}</p>
                        <div className="task-meta">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Due: {new Date(task.due_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={task.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(task.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Tasks;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Projects.css';

const Projects = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newProject, setNewProject] = useState({
        name: '',
        description: '',
        start_date: '',
        end_date: '',
        status: 'pending'
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchProjects();
    }, []);

    const fetchProjects = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setProjects(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load projects');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddProject = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', newProject, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewProject({
                name: '',
                description: '',
                start_date: '',
                end_date: '',
                status: 'pending'
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add project');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (projectId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update project status');
        }
    };

    const getStatusColor = (status) => {
        switch (status) {
            case 'completed':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            case 'in_progress':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'pending':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`projects-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>

            {showAddForm && (

                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Project Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Start Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.start_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, start_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">End Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.end_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, end_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Project</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="projects-grid">
                {projects.map(project => (
                    <div key={project.id} className="project-card theme-card">
                        <div className="project-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{project.name}</h3>
                            <span

                                style={{ backgroundColor: getStatusColor(project.status) }}
                            >
                                {project.status.replace('_', ' ')}

                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{project.description}</p>
                        <div className="project-dates">

                                Start: {new Date(project.start_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                End: {new Date(project.end_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>

                                value={project.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(project.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}

    );
};

export default Projects;

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);

        title: '',
        description: '',
        priority: 'medium',
        due_date: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchTasks();
    }, []);

    const fetchTasks = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setTasks(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load tasks');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddTask = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', newTask, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewTask({
                title: '',
                description: '',
                priority: 'medium',
                due_date: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add task');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (taskId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/${taskId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchTasks();

            setError('Failed to update task status');

        switch (priority) {

                            />
                        </div>
