import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Tasks.css';

const Tasks = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({
        title: '',
        description: '',
        priority: 'medium',
        due_date: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchTasks();
    }, []);

    const fetchTasks = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setTasks(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load tasks');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddTask = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks', newTask, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewTask({
                title: '',
                description: '',
                priority: 'medium',
                due_date: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add task');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (taskId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/${taskId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchTasks();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update task status');
        }
    };

    const getPriorityColor = (priority) => {
        switch (priority) {
            case 'high':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            case 'medium':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'low':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`tasks-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="tasks-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Tasks Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-task-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Task
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-task-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Task</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddTask}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Title</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.title}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, title: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newTask.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Priority</label>
                                <select
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newTask.priority}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, priority: e.target.value})}
                                >
                                    <option value="low">Low</option>
                                    <option value="medium">Medium</option>
                                    <option value="high">High</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Due Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newTask.due_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewTask({...newTask, due_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Task</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="tasks-grid">
                {tasks.map(task => (
                    <div key={task.id} className="task-card theme-card">
                        <div className="task-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{task.title}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="priority-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getPriorityColor(task.priority) }}
                            >
                                {task.priority}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{task.description}</p>
                        <div className="task-meta">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Due: {new Date(task.due_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={task.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(task.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Tasks;
</content>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Projects.css';

const Projects = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newProject, setNewProject] = useState({
        name: '',
        description: '',
        start_date: '',
        end_date: '',
        status: 'pending'
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchProjects();
    }, []);

    const fetchProjects = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setProjects(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load projects');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddProject = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', newProject, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewProject({
                name: '',
                description: '',
                start_date: '',
                end_date: '',
                status: 'pending'
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add project');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (projectId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update project status');
        }
    };

    const getStatusColor = (status) => {
        switch (status) {
            case 'completed':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            case 'in_progress':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'pending':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`projects-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="projects-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Projects Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-project-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Project
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-project-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Project</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddProject}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Project Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Start Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.start_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, start_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">End Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.end_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, end_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Project</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="projects-grid">
                {projects.map(project => (
                    <div key={project.id} className="project-card theme-card">
                        <div className="project-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{project.name}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="status-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getStatusColor(project.status) }}
                            >
                                {project.status.replace('_', ' ')}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{project.description}</p>
                        <div className="project-dates">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Start: {new Date(project.start_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                End: {new Date(project.end_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <div className="project-actions">
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={project.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(project.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Projects;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Employees.css';

const Employees = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState({
        name: '',
        position: '',
        department: '',
        email: '',
        password: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchEmployees();
    }, []);

    const fetchEmployees = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/employees', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setEmployees(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load employees');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddEmployee = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/employees', newEmployee, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewEmployee({
                name: '',
                position: '',
                department: '',
                email: '',
                password: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchEmployees();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add employee');
        }
    };

    const getDepartmentColor = (department) => {
        const colors = {
            'Engineering': 'var(--accent-primary)',
            'Marketing': 'var(--accent-secondary)',
            'Sales': 'var(--accent-tertiary)',
            'HR': 'var(--accent-quaternary)'
        };
        return colors[department] || 'var(--text-secondary)';
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`employees-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="employees-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Employee Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-employee-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">person_add</span>
                    Add Employee
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-employee-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Employee</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddEmployee}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Full Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Position</label>
                                <input
                                    type="text"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newEmployee.position}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, position: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Department</label>
                                <select
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newEmployee.department}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, department: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                >
                                    <option value="">Select Department</option>
                                    <option value="Engineering">Engineering</option>
                                    <option value="Marketing">Marketing</option>
                                    <option value="Sales">Sales</option>
                                    <option value="HR">HR</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Email</label>
                            <input
                                type="email"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.email}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, email: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                            <input
                                type="password"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.password}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, password: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Employee</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="employees-grid">
                {employees.map(employee => (
                    <div key={employee.id} className="employee-card theme-card">
                        <div className="employee-header">
                            <div className="employee-avatar">
                                <span className="material-icons">account_circle</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="employee-info">
                                <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{employee.name}</h3>
                                <p className="theme-text-secondary">{employee.position}</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="employee-details">
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">business</span>
                                <span className="department-badge" style={{ backgroundColor: getDepartmentColor(employee.department) }}>
                                    {employee.department}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">email</span>
                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">{employee.email}</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">calendar_today</span>
                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                    Joined: {new Date(employee.hire_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Employees;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';

const Projects = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();

    const getStatusColor = (status) => {
        switch (status) {
            case 'completed':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            case 'in_progress':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'pending':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            default:

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Projects.css';

const Projects = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newProject, setNewProject] = useState({
        name: '',
        description: '',
        start_date: '',
        end_date: '',
        status: 'pending'
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchProjects();
    }, []);

    const fetchProjects = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setProjects(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load projects');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddProject = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', newProject, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewProject({
                name: '',
                description: '',
                start_date: '',
                end_date: '',
                status: 'pending'
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add project');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (projectId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update project status');
        }
    };

    const getStatusColor = (status) => {
        switch (status) {
            case 'completed':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            case 'in_progress':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'pending':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`projects-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="projects-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Projects Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-project-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Project
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-project-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Project</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddProject}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Project Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Start Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.start_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, start_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">End Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.end_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, end_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Project</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="projects-grid">
                {projects.map(project => (
                    <div key={project.id} className="project-card theme-card">
                        <div className="project-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{project.name}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="status-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getStatusColor(project.status) }}
                            >
                                {project.status.replace('_', ' ')}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{project.description}</p>
                        <div className="project-dates">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Start: {new Date(project.start_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                End: {new Date(project.end_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <div className="project-actions">
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={project.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(project.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Projects;

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Projects.css';

const Projects = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newProject, setNewProject] = useState({
        name: '',
        description: '',
        start_date: '',
        end_date: '',
        status: 'pending'
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchProjects();
    }, []);

    const fetchProjects = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setProjects(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load projects');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddProject = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects', newProject, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewProject({
                name: '',
                description: '',
                start_date: '',
                end_date: '',
                status: 'pending'
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add project');
        }
    };

    const handleUpdateStatus = async (projectId, newStatus) => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.patch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}`, 
                { status: newStatus },
                { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }}
            );
            fetchProjects();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to update project status');
        }
    };

    const getStatusColor = (status) => {
        switch (status) {
            case 'completed':
                return 'var(--status-success)';
            case 'in_progress':
                return 'var(--status-warning)';
            case 'pending':
                return 'var(--status-error)';
            default:
                return 'var(--text-secondary)';
        }
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`projects-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="projects-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Projects Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-project-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">add</span>
                    Add Project
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-project-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Project</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddProject}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Project Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Description</label>
                            <textarea
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newProject.description}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, description: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Start Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.start_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, start_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">End Date</label>
                                <input
                                    type="date"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newProject.end_date}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewProject({...newProject, end_date: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Project</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="projects-grid">
                {projects.map(project => (
                    <div key={project.id} className="project-card theme-card">
                        <div className="project-header">
                            <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{project.name}</h3>
                            <span 
                                className="status-badge"
                                style={{ backgroundColor: getStatusColor(project.status) }}
                            >
                                {project.status.replace('_', ' ')}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <p className="theme-text-secondary">{project.description}</p>
                        <div className="project-dates">
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                Start: {new Date(project.start_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                            <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                End: {new Date(project.end_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </span>
                        </div>
                        <div className="project-actions">
                            <select
                                className="theme-input status-select"
                                value={project.status}
                                onChange={(e) => handleUpdateStatus(project.id, e.target.value)}
                            >
                                <option value="pending">Pending</option>
                                <option value="in_progress">In Progress</option>
                                <option value="completed">Completed</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Projects;
</content>

                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Position</label>
                                <input

                                    value={newEmployee.position}

                                    required

                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Department</label>
                                <select

                                    <option value="Engineering">Engineering</option>
                                    <option value="Marketing">Marketing</option>
                                    <option value="Sales">Sales</option>

                            <input

                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.email}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, email: e.target.value})}
                                required

                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                            <input
                                type="password"
                                className="theme-input"

                                required

                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}

                                Cancel

                                <span className="department-badge" style={{ backgroundColor: getDepartmentColor(employee.department) }}>
                                    {employee.department}

                            <div className="detail-item">

                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">{employee.email}</span>

                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                    Joined: {new Date(employee.hire_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import './Navbar.css';

const Navbar = () => {
    const { isDarkMode, toggleTheme } = useTheme();
    const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false);
    const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
    const [showMobileMenu, setShowMobileMenu] = useState(false);
    const navigate = useNavigate();
    const location = useLocation();

    useEffect(() => {
        const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
        const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}');
        setIsLoggedIn(!!token);
        setUsername(user.username || '');
    }, [location]);

    const handleLogout = () => {
        localStorage.removeItem('token');
        localStorage.removeItem('user');
        setIsLoggedIn(false);
        setUsername('');
        navigate('/');
    };

    const toggleMobileMenu = () => {
        setShowMobileMenu(!showMobileMenu);
    };

    return (
        <nav className={`navbar theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="navbar-brand">
                <Link to="/" className="logo">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">work</span>
                    <span className="theme-gradient-text">JobManager</span>
                </Link>
            </div>

            <div className="navbar-mobile-toggle" onClick={toggleMobileMenu}>
                <span className="material-icons theme-text-primary">
                    {showMobileMenu ? 'close' : 'menu'}
                </span>
            </div>

            <div className={`navbar-menu ${showMobileMenu ? 'active' : ''}`}>
                {isLoggedIn ? (
                    <>
                        <Link to="/dashboard" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">dashboard</span>
                            Dashboard
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/tasks" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">assignment</span>
                            Tasks
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/projects" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">folder</span>
                            Projects
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/employees" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">people</span>
                            Employees
                        </Link>
                    </>
                ) : (
                    <>
                        <Link to="/about" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">About</Link>
                        <Link to="/features" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">Features</Link>
                    </>
                )}
            </div>

            <div className="navbar-end">
                <button 
                    className="theme-toggle-btn"
                    onClick={toggleTheme}
                    title={isDarkMode ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons theme-text-primary">
                        {isDarkMode ? 'light_mode' : 'dark_mode'}
                    </span>
                </button>

                {isLoggedIn ? (
                    <div className="user-menu">
                        <div className="user-info theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">account_circle</span>
                            <span>{username}</span>
                        </div>
                        <button 
                            onClick={handleLogout}
                            className="theme-button-secondary logout-btn"
                        >
                            <span className="material-icons">logout</span>
                            Logout
                        </button>
                    </div>
                ) : (
                    <div className="auth-buttons">
                        <Link to="/login" className="theme-button-primary">Login</Link>
                        <Link to="/register" className="theme-button-secondary">Register</Link>
                    </div>
                )}
            </div>
        </nav>
    );
};

export default Navbar;
</content>
</create_file>

<final_file_content path="JobManagementSystem/frontend/src/components/Navbar.js">
/* Google Fonts Import */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Google+Sans:wght@400;500;700&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons');

/* Reset and Base Styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: 'Google Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    background-color: #F8F9FA;
    color: #202124;
    line-height: 1.5;
}

.App {
    min-height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

/* Typography */
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
    font-family: 'Google Sans', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: #202124;
}

/* Links */
a {
    color: #1a73e8;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: color 0.2s ease;
}

a:hover {
    color: #1557b0;
}

/* Buttons */
button {
    font-family: 'Google Sans', sans-serif;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

button:focus {
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(26, 115, 232, 0.4);
}

/* Container */
.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 1rem;
}

/* Scrollbar */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: #f1f3f4;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: #dadce0;
    border-radius: 4px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: #bdc1c6;
}

/* Utility Classes */
.text-primary {
    color: #1a73e8;
}

.text-success {
    color: #34A853;
}

.text-warning {
    color: #FBBC05;
}

.text-error {
    color: #EA4335;
}

.bg-primary {
    background-color: #1a73e8;
}

.bg-success {
    background-color: #34A853;
}

.bg-warning {
    background-color: #FBBC05;
}

.bg-error {
    background-color: #EA4335;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fadeIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(10px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

.fade-in {
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease forwards;
}

/* Loading State */
.loading {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    min-height: 200px;
}

.loading::after {
    content: '';
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    border: 2px solid #dadce0;
    border-top-color: #1a73e8;
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    to {
        transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
    .container {
        padding: 0 1.5rem;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
    body {
        font-size: 14px;
    }
}

</final_file_content>

<content>
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import './Navbar.css';

const Navbar = () => {
    const { isDarkMode, toggleTheme } = useTheme();
    const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false);
    const [username, setUsername] = useState('');
    const [showMobileMenu, setShowMobileMenu] = useState(false);
    const navigate = useNavigate();
    const location = useLocation();

    useEffect(() => {
        const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
        const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}');
        setIsLoggedIn(!!token);
        setUsername(user.username || '');
    }, [location]);

    const handleLogout = () => {
        localStorage.removeItem('token');
        localStorage.removeItem('user');
        setIsLoggedIn(false);
        setUsername('');
        navigate('/');
    };

    const toggleMobileMenu = () => {
        setShowMobileMenu(!showMobileMenu);
    };

    return (
        <nav className={`navbar theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="navbar-brand">
                <Link to="/" className="logo">
                    <span className="material-icons theme-gradient-text">work</span>
                    <span className="theme-gradient-text">JobManager</span>
                </Link>
            </div>

            <div className="navbar-mobile-toggle" onClick={toggleMobileMenu}>
                <span className="material-icons theme-text-primary">
                    {showMobileMenu ? 'close' : 'menu'}
                </span>
            </div>

            <div className={`navbar-menu ${showMobileMenu ? 'active' : ''}`}>
                {isLoggedIn ? (
                    <>
                        <Link to="/dashboard" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">dashboard</span>
                            Dashboard
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/tasks" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">assignment</span>
                            Tasks
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/projects" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">folder</span>
                            Projects
                        </Link>
                        <Link to="/employees" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">people</span>
                            Employees
                        </Link>
                    </>
                ) : (
                    <>
                        <Link to="/about" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">About</Link>
                        <Link to="/features" className="nav-link theme-text-primary">Features</Link>
                    </>
                )}
            </div>

            <div className="navbar-end">
                <button 
                    className="theme-toggle-btn"
                    onClick={toggleTheme}
                    title={isDarkMode ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons theme-text-primary">
                        {isDarkMode ? 'light_mode' : 'dark_mode'}
                    </span>
                </button>

                {isLoggedIn ? (
                    <div className="user-menu">
                        <div className="user-info theme-text-primary">
                            <span className="material-icons">account_circle</span>
                            <span>{username}</span>
                        </div>
                        <button 
                            onClick={handleLogout}
                            className="theme-button-secondary logout-btn"
                        >
                            <span className="material-icons">logout</span>
                            Logout
                        </button>
                    </div>
                ) : (
                    <div className="auth-buttons">
                        <Link to="/login" className="theme-button-primary">Login</Link>
                        <Link to="/register" className="theme-button-secondary">Register</Link>
                    </div>
                )}
            </div>
        </nav>
    );
};

export default Navbar;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext';
import axios from 'axios';
import './Employees.css';

const Employees = () => {
    const { isDarkMode } = useTheme();
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    const [error, setError] = useState(null);
    const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState({
        name: '',
        position: '',
        department: '',
        email: '',
        password: ''
    });
    const [showAddForm, setShowAddForm] = useState(false);

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchEmployees();
    }, []);

    const fetchEmployees = async () => {
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/employees', {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setEmployees(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to load employees');
            setLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const handleAddEmployee = async (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        try {
            const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
            await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/employees', newEmployee, {
                headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }
            });
            setNewEmployee({
                name: '',
                position: '',
                department: '',
                email: '',
                password: ''
            });
            setShowAddForm(false);
            fetchEmployees();
        } catch (err) {
            setError('Failed to add employee');
        }
    };

    const getDepartmentColor = (department) => {
        const colors = {
            'Engineering': 'var(--accent-primary)',
            'Marketing': 'var(--accent-secondary)',
            'Sales': 'var(--accent-tertiary)',
            'HR': 'var(--accent-quaternary)'
        };
        return colors[department] || 'var(--text-secondary)';
    };

    if (loading) return <div className="loading-spinner" />;
    if (error) return <div className="error-message">{error}</div>;

    return (
        <div className={`employees-container theme-bg-primary ${isDarkMode ? 'dark-mode' : ''}`}>
            <div className="employees-header">
                <h2 className="theme-text-primary">Employee Management</h2>
                <button 
                    className="theme-button-primary add-employee-btn"
                    onClick={() => setShowAddForm(true)}
                >
                    <span className="material-icons">person_add</span>
                    Add Employee
                </button>
            </div>

            {showAddForm && (
                <div className="add-employee-form theme-card">
                    <h3 className="theme-text-primary">Add New Employee</h3>
                    <form onSubmit={handleAddEmployee}>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Full Name</label>
                            <input
                                type="text"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.name}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, name: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-row">
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Position</label>
                                <input
                                    type="text"
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newEmployee.position}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, position: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                />
                            </div>
                            <div className="form-group">
                                <label className="theme-text-secondary">Department</label>
                                <select
                                    className="theme-input"
                                    value={newEmployee.department}
                                    onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, department: e.target.value})}
                                    required
                                >
                                    <option value="">Select Department</option>
                                    <option value="Engineering">Engineering</option>
                                    <option value="Marketing">Marketing</option>
                                    <option value="Sales">Sales</option>
                                    <option value="HR">HR</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Email</label>
                            <input
                                type="email"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.email}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, email: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-group">
                            <label className="theme-text-secondary">Password</label>
                            <input
                                type="password"
                                className="theme-input"
                                value={newEmployee.password}
                                onChange={(e) => setNewEmployee({...newEmployee, password: e.target.value})}
                                required
                            />
                        </div>
                        <div className="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" className="theme-button-primary">Add Employee</button>
                            <button 
                                type="button" 
                                className="theme-button-secondary"
                                onClick={() => setShowAddForm(false)}
                            >
                                Cancel
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            )}

            <div className="employees-grid">
                {employees.map(employee => (
                    <div key={employee.id} className="employee-card theme-card">
                        <div className="employee-header">
                            <div className="employee-avatar">
                                <span className="material-icons">account_circle</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="employee-info">
                                <h3 className="theme-text-primary">{employee.name}</h3>
                                <p className="theme-text-secondary">{employee.position}</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="employee-details">
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">business</span>
                                <span className="department-badge" style={{ backgroundColor: getDepartmentColor(employee.department) }}>
                                    {employee.department}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">email</span>
                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">{employee.email}</span>
                            </div>
                            <div className="detail-item">
                                <span className="material-icons theme-text-secondary">calendar_today</span>
                                <span className="theme-text-secondary">
                                    Joined: {new Date(employee.hire_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                ))}
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Employees;
</content>
</create_file>
